code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{TextField,Button,MenuItem,Box,Typography,FormControl,InputLabel,Select,Checkbox,ListItemText,Input}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const courses=["JavaScript","React","Node.js","CSS","Python","HTML","C#",".NET"];const UserForm=_ref=>{let{refresh}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState({username:"",courses:[]});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;if(name==="courses"){const newCourses=value;setUser(prev=>({...prev,courses:newCourses}));}else{setUser(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));}};const handleSubmit=async()=>{await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/users`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)});setUser({username:"",courses:[]});refresh();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Username",name:"username",value:user.username,onChange:handleChange,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{multiple:true,name:"courses",value:user.courses,onChange:handleChange,input:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{}),renderValue:selected=>selected.join(", "),children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem,{value:course,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{checked:user.courses.indexOf(course)>-1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:course})]},course))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,children:"Submit"})]});};export default UserForm;
